title: From the Bunker
description: From the Bunker is an intense adventure puzzle escape game where the apocalypse has left you stranded in a desolate, crumbling bunker. With limited resources and danger lurking around every corner, your mission is to outlast the harsh environment, scavenge for critical supplies, and plot your escape before time runs out. As you navigate the bunkerâ€™s eerie corridors, you'll need to upgrade your tools, defend yourself against unexpected threats, and take on challenges that will push your ingenuity and strategic thinking to the limit.
